name: Loan Calculator Pro
author: How To Create A Press Release

sections.description:
Responsive Mortgage Loan Rate Calculator Widget installs as a widget on your WordPress blog or website.

Monthly Mortgage Loan Calculator Pro works on any type of page or sidebar as a widget. You can also use the mortgage loan calculator on your wordpress blog pages using custom shortcode or just add it as a sidebar widget. Thanks for using The Loan Calculator Pro WordPress Widget for WordPress website or blog! Please view our other plugins here

PLUGIN FEATURES

Add this short code [loan-calculator] to any page where you want to show the loan calculator.

Please visit howtocreateapressrelease.com to learn more about the plugin. For any questions about the plugin or help with the plugin please contact our support team at anytime through our website – Contact howtocreateapressrelease support Visit our website to find the best Press Release Distribution Services or download our other plugin available on wordpress.org press release distribution plugin.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Install through your wordpress panel. Simply Upload and install the zip file to install.

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

  3. Go to your Widgets panel and simply drag the loan calculator widget to the sidebar to display it.

  4. Or Add this short code [loan-calculator] to any page where you want to show the loan calculator.
sections.faq:
What minimum version of WordPress is required?

This plugin requires minimum version 1.0 or later of WordPress.

What are the licensing terms?

This plugin is available for free under the GNU General Public License, Version 2.

What is the latest tested version of WordPress this is compatible with?

This plugin has been tested up to version 5.02 of WordPress.

Does this plugin have any issues with any other plugins or themes?

This plugin is safe and fully tested with all current version of WordPress. Works fine with all other plugins, works perfectly with yoast wordpress seo plugin, contact form 7, akismet, also jetpack, and also works perfectly with any theme, no compatibility issues with any plugins or any other themes. This plugin is tested and safe for your wp site or blog and fully responsive and tested in all browsers.

How can I find more information about the plugin?

For any additional questions please contact support at anytime. You can use our contact form on our website or contact support through our email – Contact howtocreateapressrelease.com
sections.changelog:
Loan Calculator Pro Tool Version 1.0

  • Updated Readme, New Plugin updates coming soon for an ethereum calculator and bitcoin calculator feature.

  • Initial release.
